(i) the audited financial results (standalone & consolidated) results along with the Independent Auditor''s Report and a declaration is respect of unmodified opinion on audited financial results for the year March 31, 2024.
(ii) convening of the 20th AGM to be held on July 24, 2024 (Wednesday).
(iii) the cut-off date for the purpose of determining eligible shareholders for e-voting shall be July 17, 2024 (Wednesday).

The meeting of the Board of Director commenced at 11:50 hrs and concluded at 12:45 hrs.
